name: BLOXBLOXBLOXBLOX
description:
I AM NOT ROBLOX!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

GAME JAM: https://itch.io/jam/teh-best-joe-game

if you dont have windows 7 you need https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=26347

website: https://sites.google.com/view/bloxbloxbloxblox

BLOXBLOXBLOXBLOX is an NOTonline world for kids (and adults) who like to build, invent and compete. The BLOXBLOXBLOXBLOX world is built from thousands of physically simulated components that can be put together to make buildings, vehicles, scenery, characters and traps. You play in user-created worlds with blocks. Unlike most other games there aren't any pre-defined goals. You are given blocks and left to do whatever you want. you can even get a epic player.
